amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part E of House Report 117-432 to require the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation (PBGC) to issue a request for information to the public regarding ways to ensure the long-term solvency of the agency's insurance programs and submit a report, with recommendations, to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursaunt to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
